listitem.para: [upstream] - gcc-5 fixes for: mdadm-3.3.2, xorg-server-1.17.1, qt-4.8.6.
[upstream] - thunderbird-31.6.0: fix some code when building with libvpx-1.4.0 and later.
[upstream] - libtiff - incorporate existing sed and nine upstream patches into a consolidated patch.
[upstream] - Add Setuptools-14.1.1 and Mako-1.0.1 Python modules, as they are needed by Mesa-10.5.1.
